def.dt: :to force, to oblige los hice esperar : I made them wait
:to act haces bien : you're doing the right thing
:ago hace mucho tiempo : a long time ago, for a long time
:it doesn't matter, it makes no difference
:to pretend, to act, to play hacerse el tonto : to play dumb
:to seem el examen se me hizo difÃ­cil : the exam seemed difficult to me
:to get, to grow se hace tarde : it's growing late
